Uses of Class
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise.WindowedTriadNoiseEstimator

Packages that use WindowedTriadNoiseEstimator
Package
Description
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.intervals
Contains classes to find static (body of device remains static) or dynamic intervals (some movement or force is applied to body of device) for accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer sensors.
com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise
Contains classes related to noise level estimation.

    Subclasses of WindowedTriadNoiseEstimator in com.irurueta.navigation.inertial.calibration.noise
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    WindowedAccelerationTriadNoiseEstimator
    Estimates accelerometer noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with the accelerometer average values for a windowed amount of samples.
    class 
    WindowedAngularSpeedTriadNoiseEstimator
    Estimates angular speed noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with the gyroscope average values for a windowed amount of samples.
    class 
    WindowedMagneticFluxDensityTriadNoiseEstimator
    Estimates magnetometer noise variances and PSD's (Power Spectral Densities) along with the magnetometer average values for a windowed amount of samples.
